original: intros Ha. unfold Sigma in Ha. inversion Ha as [c [Hc]]. apply P_inv in Hc as [Heq | [ | [s [t [Heq Hneq]]]]]. - rewrite Heq in Hc. apply NoDup_remove_2 in Hc. destruct Hc. apply H. constructor 1. auto. - destruct Hc. - destruct Hneq as [_ Hneq]. contradict Hneq. exists x, y. split. ++ apply der_sing. auto. ++ constructor 1. auto.
